name: A beautiful sword's hilt (2h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (awesome in general).
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than avarage.
The sword hilt's powers are activated when it is wielded like a sword.
A magical blade of pure magical force is projected from the slot in
the hilt, forming a perfectly balanced weapon.
The damage type of the weapon depends highly on what is needed.
